cu.explanation_en: Setting the NGU interface IP address to an invalid format with octet 999 exceeding 255 will cause binding failure and prevent NGU interface communication.

du.explanation_en: Setting the RU MAC address to an invalid format with non-hex characters will cause hardware address resolution failure and prevent connection to the RU.
du.explanation_zh: 將 RU MAC 地址設定為無效格式，其中包含非十六進位字符，會導致硬體地址解析失敗，並阻止與 RU 的連接。
